author: sky.cactus
content:
As all things Ethereum, there are relatively few hard and fast rules.  However, I am very hardcore about EIPs being purely technical specifications, not arguments, position papers, essays, lists, catalogs, etc.

I'm also very hardcore about having EIPs not link to external content, especially mutable content.

author: sky.cactus
content: EIPs are not the proper place to store aggregate information surrounding an EIP.  The EIP is the core technical spec that other things link to, it isn't the place to aggregate useful information.

author: sky.cactus
content: Think of it like the Genesis block of the tree of EIP-1559.  Lots of stuff points back to it, but it doesn't point to anything.
